sentence: Would recommend this to competant skiers but try to avoid French school holidays if you are a beginner or going because of the lessons there are plenty of alternatives with English tour operators where all the class will be English and lessons are in English
The family shows are too late to be enjoyed by the family as everyone has to be up by 7 am to get ready for ski school
We were a group of 10 and most of the time had to fit onto a 8 table as there were never free tables even though several were empty

We are usually a bigger group on our holidays to CM and have never had a problem with finding either whole tables or ones close together but due to this new craze of reserving it meant little was available to us
Little gripe was that although 170 teenagers at Club med that week there was not a beginners group gfor the 11 17 teenagers
Perhaps it was simply a case of our group being English but the staff really were very rude and hostile save a few friendly and helpful members
Decided to try club med feel like we have been missing out by only trying this now as we ’ve had such a fantastic holiday
We were a mixed group of mixed abilities skiers and snowboarders
Some folks were carrying their own gluten free fods if you do n’t speak French do n’t count on easy socializing particularly for teens
My daughter wanted to do the teen club but could not as she was faced with 20 French boys and so language was a problem
We went on a family skiing holiday in December and this was our first time in France
The staff could not do enough for you the food was the best I have had on a ski holiday
It was a ski in ski out hotel which just makes this place the perfect ski holiday
Where was the adolescent GO organising all the teens
They have done an incredible job and they have transformed this vacation into the best of my life
There are so many names to highlight for having transformed this trip into the best of my life that I should start right away
We visited the renovated club med in alp d’huez with the whole family total of 8 adults and one baby
Overall it is a great place to spend your ski holidays
A complete package especially for families and a strong recommendation
Thank you Club Med family we really hope to come back next year
